DataSourcePortable.Name: Dashboard Comercial - Valores faturados
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(PES.NOME) QTD,
 PES.NOME,
 PES.CGCCPF CNPJ,
 ITEM.TIPO,
 ITEM.DASHBOARD,
 SUM(CASE WHEN (OP.CODIGOINTERNO IN (11, 12)) THEN ITEM.VALOR * -1 ELSE ITEM.VALOR END) VALORFATURADO,
 CASE WHEN (OP.CODIGOINTERNO IN (11, 12)) THEN 'DEV' ELSE 'NORMAL' END TIPONF
 FROM CM_DWDASHBOARDCOMERCIALITENS ITEM
 JOIN GN_PESSOAS PES ON(PES.HANDLE = ITEM.PESSOA)
 JOIN FN_DOCUMENTOS DOC ON DOC.HANDLE = ITEM.NOTAFISCAL
 JOIN GN_OPERACOES OP ON OP.HANDLE = DOC.OPERACAO
 WHERE ITEM.TIPO = 1
 AND ITEM.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA
 GROUP BY PES.NOME,
 PES.CGCCPF,
 ITEM.DASHBOARD,
 ITEM.TIPO,
 OP.CODIGOINTERNO" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTD" From="A" Path="QTD" /> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <Field Alias="CNPJ" From="A" Path="CNPJ" /> <Field Alias="TIPO" From="A" Path="TIPO" /> <Field Alias="DASHBOARD" From="A" Path="DASHBOARD" /> <Field Alias="VALORFATURADO" From="A" Path="VALORFATURADO" /> <Field Alias="TIPONF" From="A" Path="TIPONF" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
